analysis.description:

Crowdsale.start (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#324-331) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(crowdsaleStartTime == 0)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.processContribution (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#363-388):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(sender,contributionInTokens) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#371)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSent (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#384-385)

Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#340-347) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.destroy(remainingBalance) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#344-345)

Crowdsale.migrate (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#349-360) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-preToken.destroyFrom(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#357)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.processContribution (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#363-388):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(sender,contributionInTokens) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa971afdca01bd1ca1499346e730a3d1dc06a3a9d.sol#371)
